summary: "Twin Peaks" is an American TV show created by Mark Frost and David Lynch. It first aired on ABC in 1990 and follows the investigation into the murder of Laura Palmer in the fictional town of Twin Peaks. The series is known for its mysterious and eerie tone, with supernatural elements and quirky characters. After its initial run, it gained a cult following and was revived in 2017 on Showtime. The show's unique style and storytelling have made it a critically acclaimed landmark in TV drama.
title: Twin Peaks
